Articles.Content:
OK, I realise we couldn't have ISP on a tablet/phone, but wouldn't it be cool if we could have like a building app.

You know like be able just to build our ships and possibly extract them as craft files when we get home,

E miliar to the apps I use for eve to make ships

That would be great, I'd love to be able to use the editor when mobile (spend half my time thinking about designs anyway ).

In the meantime, there is SimpleRockets, which is kinda like a 2D KSP.
Yea I got that too the eve app I use is is very good, with full ships and hundreds of modules, so I'm sure that if a budding android programmer put one together hint hint
